metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36658 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: In Apache::Session::LDAP before 0.5, validity of the X.509 certificate isnot checked by default when connecting to remote LDAP backends, because thedefault configuration of the Net::LDAPS module for Perl is used. NOTE: thiscan, for example, be fixed in conjunction with the CVE-2020-16093 fix.

criterions.comment: libapache-session-ldap-perl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
